FuncDef:
The forwarding-simulation inbound-interface command specifies a simulated inbound interface.
The undo forwarding-simulation inbound-interface command deletes the simulated inbound interface configuration.
By default, no simulated inbound interfaces are configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a simulated inbound interface.
-

Specifies the name of a simulated inbound interface.
-

Specifies the number of a simulated inbound interface.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
By default, NQA test packets of ICMP Ping test type are considered as host packets. The host packets have a higher forwarding priority than the forwarded packets.
The forwarding-simulation inbound-interface command specifies a simulated interface through which the NQA test packets, same as the forwarded packets, are forwarded to the product forwarding channel.
